A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi transcends.  It sends the message we all need to know\, feel\, understand.  You don't have to have noble bloodlines or be special to have that deep connection to the universe.  The Force is not found in a book\, tome\, temple or person.  It is there\, underlying everything\, binding the universe together and even the smartest\, most savvy and wise can be completely wrong.  I absolutely loved this movie because it took the hard\, unbroken and nontraditional path - and it crushed expectations - it transcended them.  Fan boys quit your whining.  Star Wars is not yours\, The Force is not yours\, it belongs to the universe and any of us may find our way to that deeper meaning\, purpose and life.
